name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-teams-graph-upload-as-pdf
title: Teams Graph Upload as PDF
shortDescription: This SPFx web part (or Teams Tab) enables a user to upload a supported file type via drag and drop while the uploaded file will be converted as PDF
longDescription: This SPFx web part (or Teams Tab) enables a user to upload a supported file type via drag and drop while the uploaded file will be converted as PDF

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
